attributes.action: Introduce a Bank Holiday in June to celebrate Class 37 trains
attributes.background: We want an additional bank holiday in June, and believe Class 37s are great trains. The Government should introduce a Class 37 Bank Holiday in June, to give people an extra day off, and celebrate these trains.
